website_summaries.verdict: A popular granola bar with the perfect blend of nutrition and flavor. An ideal choice for consumers who want both.
pros: Filled with healthy ingredients and 100% whole grains
cons: The crunchy bars are somewhat crumbly

website_summaries.verdict: These nutrition bars are a popular choice for good reasons – they are packed with good ingredients, tasty flavors and protein, and less sugar than others on our list.
pros: Top-selling bars with less sugar than most competitors – some varieties have only 5 grams per bar
Made with simple ingredients, gluten free
available in a variety of flavors with ingredients like dark chocolate and nuts
cons: Occasional reports of stale or hard bars upon delivery
Some of the nut varieties also have hard textures

website_summaries.verdict: A classic bar balancing nutty goodness and tasty chocolate and topped with Brazilian sea salt. A good mix of protein, carbs, and fat.
pros: Higher protein than some of the brand's regular bars
Low glycemic index, with only five grams of sugar
cons: Some bars are shipped past the expiration date or arrive with a stale taste

customer_reviews.title: Not so Kind. Poor Customer Service. Almond shell in the Kind bar broke my tooth.
customer_reviews.text: I broke my tooth on an almond shell that was left in the Kind Bar. Cost over $2,000 for a full dental crown to repair. Contacted the folks at Kind (They are really not too kind!) and they sort of laughed off my complaint. NOT RECCOMENDED due to POOR/NO CUSTOMER SERVICE service, Low quality products that should not have waste nut shells in the final consumable product.
customer_reviews.author: Patty T

customer_reviews.title: Buy from here and you will get a 12 pack of bars that will expire within a week....
customer_reviews.text: Hard as a rock when biting into it and it's no wonder. I ordered on Oct 19 and was shipped bars with an expiration date of Oct 29. Pass on these unless you want the Jawbreaker version of Kind bars...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the last few boxes.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten at least 6 or more boxes. I agree with some of the other product users that complain about them being hard as a rock. The first couple boxes were good. If I get another box of hard bars that will be it for kind. It’s almost as if they were kept in a warm climate too long.
customer_reviews.author: Bob T.

customer_reviews.title: An excellent source of protein with low sugar content
customer_reviews.text: I eat one regularly. An excellent source of protein with low sugar content, much less than most energy bars in the market. A recent concern has appeared with the new scientific (NATURE, Jan.2018) evidence showing a strong correlation between the use of TREHALOSA (a sugar supplement) in processed foods, and the emergence of a specially virulent and antibiotic resistant strain of C. difficile - a gut bacteria capable of producing severe illness and even potentially death- in the gut of those who consume food processed with this sugar. It would be appropriate for the manufacturer to make a statement or disclaimer regarding the presence (or not) of this sugar in these bars.
customer_reviews.author: Respiratory Consultants, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: I think this is the best snack bar I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike every snack/protein/granola bar I've ever tried, and I've tried a lot of them. They are either two sweet, taste weird, or end up upsetting my stomach. I've tried various flavors of KIND bars, too, and I didn't really like them. That is, until I received one of these dark chocolate nuts and sea salt KIND bars as a sample, and I have now gone through 4 boxes. Yes, FOUR boxes. The flavor is outstanding, the ingredients are clean, the carbs are low, it doesn't upset my GI tract, and it really curbs my hunger for several hours. Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Cookbook Gal

customer_reviews.title: Very sad to say...
customer_reviews.text: Very sadly this box of 12 bars are all hard as a rock. They are delicious when purchased from my grocery store. These, however, are inedible.
customer_reviews.author: LO

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: Um, yes 😁. They are boooooomb. Lots of calories, but all things considered they have a low glycemic impact. By far my favorite KIND bar is the coconut / dark chocolate. If you like the taste of Mounds chocolate bars - you'll be a huge fan of these. Plus, they are a much healthier and tastier alternative. Give them a shot... You'll be happy that you did!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle D.

customer_reviews.title: Kinds are started to add glucose syrup instead of natural ...
customer_reviews.text: Kinds are started to add glucose syrup instead of natural sugars only & increased sugar content which taste gross& also getting more expensive. Dont forget there are many protein bars out there with high sugar content & much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: hjon203

customer_reviews.title: Tasty snack
customer_reviews.text: I love chocolate - plain and simple. But I am trying to cut back on sugars, bad fats, salt. These make a nice snack - in moderation - because they are 200 calories in each 40g bar. Coincidentally, I just had one as my evening snack before I saw that I needed to write a review. They're a nice way to satisfy my sweet tooth (which is getting to be less each day) and enjoy at the end of my day.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Discrepancy on nutritional value
customer_reviews.text: Some misrepresentation on the product nutritional value label. See pictures of two boxes. The bar label shows 200 calories whereas the box label shows 180. If they are not paying attention to this discrepancy, how much of time they will be spending on the quality of the product, plus we pay unbelievably high price on these.
customer_reviews.author: VMR

customer_reviews.title: Way Better Than Bird Feed
customer_reviews.text: This is great for people like me who absolutely detest nut/granola bars with fruit in them. It's saltier than I had expected but will probably come off as bland if you're looking for something that actually tastes like chocolate. It leaves something to be desired - maybe if there were more chocolate or the chocolate were sweeter? That would require a nutritional compromise however, so I guess it depends on what you're looking for. Nonetheless, this is a quality product that can satisfy a snack craving without guilt. If you don't agree, then go shove it with a Snickers bar.
customer_reviews.author: Hideyo

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Product had not reached the expiration date but was of poor quality. It had poor flavor (Some might say it tasted like cardboard.) & was as hard a brick. Very disappointed because it didn't come close to my expectations. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: William N. Whye

customer_reviews.title: Dark Chocolate Nuts and Sea Salt Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of Kind bars. I tried the Dark Chocolate Nuts and Sea Salt twice. Each time I found that a few of the bars tasted as though some of the nuts were rancid. I checked for the expiration dates. Both packages were well within the freshness time frame. I will continue buying Kind bars, but will stick with my absolute favorite, Dark Chocolate Mocha Almond.
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Kitto

customer_reviews.title: Better Tasting Than Candy
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tasting Nut/Healthy/Granola Bar out there. As good or better than candy. That is because these bars are essentially wonderful things like high quality nuts, chocolate, salt, etc,, all "glued" together with a thin sugar coating. The only issue is price, and perhaps calories. But what are you going to do? The calories come with the nuts, and you do get some high quality healthy protein. Basically, if you are health conscious, just got your tax refund check, and want to treat yourself to something better than candy - these are your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dog

customer_reviews.title: I love the DARK CHOCOLATE flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I keep a nice stock of these KIND bars at my office in my drawer. It is great to have a somewhat healthy snack on hand. There are tons of almonds and peanuts and a nice coating of chocolate (Mmm) on the back side. These are great when you don't have much time, still want to eat a little healthy, and have a little treat at the same time! These are also great for on the go. We like to pack all flavors of KIND as on the go snacks for the park, festivals, hiking, picnics, etc. (Sometimes these can be a little salty - so if you are salt averse, skip this flavor)
customer_reviews.author: amulet

customer_reviews.title: OLD Product 6 months to expired
customer_reviews.text: If you want to eat them right away then they may not expire if you plan or having then for later, I would not buy unless you make them show you Expiration Date of Product.
customer_reviews.author: Horsyguy

customer_reviews.title: OLD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. I buy them all the time. I purchased these on a black Friday deal. I broke open the package as soon as they came in... the were hard and I could hardly chew them. Usually they are soft and chewy. They are old and I think that is why they put them on sale. I will not purchase like this again. I got burned.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Bessire

customer_reviews.title: Tastes OLD & BRITTLE, yet has a 2019 'Best by:' date
customer_reviews.text: Ordered KIND dark choco, nuts & sea salt bars in Nov2018. The 4 that I opened all tasted OLD & BRITTLE, yet has a Nov2019 'Best by:' date on the box. I would love to return remaining unopened bars to KIND or AMAZON, but found out that they are 'not eligible for return' No savings there with 'Subscribe & Save'!! I have had GREAT confidence & results ordering anything from AMAZON over the last 8 years, but I won't be ordering anymore food items. I have ordered these KIND bars @ Amazon before & they were always fresh, but it appears that KIND 'overbaked' a batch or AMAZON didn't store them properly. Signed ... disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bluke

customer_reviews.title: Beware, now has PEANUTS!!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these over a dozen times because that are a delicious, healthy treat/ snack for my family. The reason for my 1 star review is because all of a sudden the second ingredient is PEANUTS and my daughter has a deadly allergy to peanuts! I didn't even think to look twice at the ingredients because ive ordered them so many times and one of the slides even says "new look, same flavor", nothing about new ingredients! Thank the LORD my daughter detected the peanuts before she ate it, or else we'd be in the ER right now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Franchesca W.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with chocolate melted and messy inside package, so that when opened, slivers of chocolate fell out. Even after refrigerating, the bar was so messy, I had to eat it over the kitchen sink. Very difficult to bite into, and to chew. Tasted okay; but not worth the effort and mess and cost.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A.

customer_reviews.title: So Much to Love!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are SO VERY VERY VERY GOOD! I want to keep eating them, but I force myself to stop. They say that 59% of each bar are nuts (almonds mainly and some peanuts), and they are FULL of delicious nuts! There are 7 grams of dietary fiber from chicory root fiber, so only 5 grams sugar in each 180 calorie bar. What I also love about them is what is NOT in them-no gluten, no dairy, no sugar alcohols, and no GMOs! They have 6 grams of protein. But what I really love about them is the superb taste, the chocolate, and those nuts! I’m buying many more in times to come! Sorry for all the exclamation points.
customer_reviews.author: Sany123Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Open bars
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. We buy these in bulk because my family loves them, unfortunately we just opened a box and every one of the bars was open. We had a backlog of these boxes so we didn’t open it as soon as it was delivered so all of them are stale. Sooo disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really bad! Melted for the second time!
customer_reviews.text: This was our first review: "We had a heat wave and the bars were completely melted!" Now, we ordered two more boxes and they are ALL MELTED! They look disgusting, too. One time might be a mistake; twice means they don't care if they melt.
customer_reviews.author: C. Vigil

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: These granola bars are pretty expensive, but they're SO good. Kind is unmatched as far as granola bar quality. They're made w/ real ingredients and are actually filling. This is something I have for breakfast or to satisfy my late night chocolate craving. It's more like part of a meal, so I see the price as worth it. Dark chocolate sea salt nut is my favorite. For me, the salt is perfect. It's like salted nuts mixed w/ chocolate. I could see how this wouldn't be nice to eat if you're in need of dental work or something. But my gums are sensitive and it doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: not fresh
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't expire for another year, but oddly it's very hard/brittle. I've had this Kind Bar before, so I know they're supposed to be soft/fresh nuts with a chewy consistency. You should be able to pull out some nuts while eating it and you will sort of see a gooey consistency like a rice krispies treat. Instead this is hard like a cracker.
customer_reviews.author: eterna

customer_reviews.title: Hard and stale.
customer_reviews.text: Hard as a rock. This is my second order and I thought it would be better than the first. Both were too hard to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Very chewy
customer_reviews.text: These Kind bars were very chewy and stuck to my teeth. I don't know if it was just this batch but when I bought one in the store, I think it was fresher and crispier. Still good though.
customer_reviews.author: CatMM

customer_reviews.title: Taste do good Super enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: My family love kind bars ,usually buy from the grocery store, first time buy it from the amazon, Got it better price than the grocery store, shipping fast and packing well, Dark Chocolate Nuts & Sea Salt bars tastes great , lower sugar was not too sweet , all of my family’s super enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Completely melted upon delivery, disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received 2 boxes of these today and they are completely melted. All of the chocolate on the bars are melted and now smeared all over the wrapper. This is very disappointing, considering the cost of them. Granted, it is summer; however, maybe a cold pack should be used when shipping during these months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but rock hard
customer_reviews.text: These are on point flavor and ingredient wise, hence the two stars. However they are hard as a rock! They have cracked TWO of the brackets off my sons braces on different occasions. I worry about chopping my own teeth. I wish they were so hard. I don’t know if they’re stale or not. Tasty but your teeth may not survive...
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Seems a bit stale
customer_reviews.text: I received it fine and the expiration date is well into the future. But biting into it, I was surprised on how hard it was. I've bought this flavor of Kind bar many times before (individually at stores or boxed from supermarkets), so I know how it should taste and what the texture should be like. Each one was hard as a rock. Not sure why since packaging was tightly sealed and the flavor itself was OK.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Tasty breakfast/snack bar but quite sweet and with low protein
customer_reviews.text: These KIND bars are quite tasty, especially the dark chocolate nuts & sea salt flavor. Value is reasonable but not outstanding at around $1.25 per bar. However, they are quite sweet with a sugar content indicated at 5g for a 40g bar. And most importantly they are not very filling with a low protein content of 6g. They are fine if you have a sweet tooth but they have no health or nutritional benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Philippe

customer_reviews.title: Very very still and more solid than the hardest Granite you could find.
customer_reviews.text: I have eaten kind bars for years I think these are the hardest most stale kind bars I have had! I am very very disappointed! Mainly because I can't go out and go shopping I have to rely on online shopping and when you get this quality or the lack of quality it makes me feel very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all costs
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting. Vile. Choose any word that is synonymous with those. I've eaten 3 bars and each time i vomited 10-15 minutes later, so it's safe to say these are the problem. They feel and taste like styrofoam, probably because they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A decadent approach to dieting
customer_reviews.text: These dark chocolate, nut and sea salt Kind bars are a lifesaver at only 200 calories. They tuck easily into my purse and bridge the gap to keep hunger at bay, especially when I am on the go. Amazon's price beats the grocery store and porch delivery is not only convenient, it keeps me away from the diet danger aisle in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Starwoman33

customer_reviews.title: No Longer Purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I gave them 2 stars solely because the flavors are good but KIND has unfortunately gone down hill. They process their chocolate with alkali now and the last few boxes I tried were stale and tore up my gums. I've since switch to Enjoy Life for nice GG snacks that actually taste amazing with healthy, quality ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Fage

customer_reviews.title: May Or May Not Be My Favorite Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I keep contradicting myself about which Kind Bar is my favorite, so I won't say that this one is my favorite, but it sure is the one I am craving right now. I crave the crunch and the saltiness and the dark chocolate. I don't kid myself that Kind Bars are health food. I grab them for a crunchy snack and appreciate that I can get some much-needed protein along the way.
customer_reviews.author: Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, Fills you up
customer_reviews.text: These Kind bars are so delicious and of course healthy. Loaded with almonds and dark chocolate for fiber. The price is getting higher but they are good for breakfast alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Kell

customer_reviews.title: Freshness may vary
customer_reviews.text: My thoughts are kind of torn on Kind bars. Some were ok & some were firm & leaned towards the stale side. It was kind of a toss up. I would only purchase again in quantity for the right price - maybe
customer_reviews.author: R. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Not too hard
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you buy these in a store and they are as hard as a rock. But these ones came in good condition. I like KIND bars because I can get my chocolate fix while still getting fiber and protein. There is some added sugar, but its not an absolute deal breaker. You can find a way to fit these into a healthy diet, which is what I really like.
customer_reviews.author: Cloudking

customer_reviews.title: Besides enjoying Kind bars, Amazon has the best price, bar none, haha
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why Kind bars in spite of their flavor, variety, and wholesomeness sell for $2.00 a bar. I bought these mainly for my 82 yr old father who doesn't have a sweet tooth but enjoys dark chocolate and nuts. Amazon allows me to get him something he enjoys and I can afford. I love Amazon! Quality, variety, and the BEST customer service period!!
customer_reviews.author: Claudette G.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this flavor so we buy them often. Just enough salt to flavor them and sweet enough to fill your sweet tooth, healthy enough that you won't feel guilty about them! So its a win-win. Kind bars are gluten free so there aren't any crappy extra ingredients to make you sick. Just nuts, a little unsweetened chocolate, salt and whatever is in between. Note: Don't keep them in your car, or in the sun. They melt. Keep in a cooler if you have one. If my review was helpful, please click the "Yes" button that indicates a helpful review, and please follow me to see all my past and future reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: A kind word for yummy Kind Bars!
customer_reviews.text: These Kind Bars are so delicious!!! The Dark Chocolate Nuts & Sea Salt version is my very favorite, and it is a mainstay in my Subscribe and Save list. As soon as I read the description (Sweet and salty blend of almonds, peanuts, and walnuts drizzled in chocolate with a touch of sea salt) I was a goner! I have these bars stashed wherever I might need them, including my purse. I haven't had any quality control issues (ie bars that have opened bags) and I've been very satisfied! Very importantly, Kind Bars use a palm kernel oil provider that is a certified member of the RSPO (Roundtable on Sustainable Palm Oil). Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Valleri

customer_reviews.title: Chicory root fiber is the devil
customer_reviews.text: Chicory root fiber is the devil and should never be put into food whatsoever. I'm not sure why it's suddenly the cheap fiber that all companies are using but it makes these delicious bars completely inedible. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Chapeau

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate + nuts + salty + just a little sweet
customer_reviews.text: These bars are tasty. I try to keep one of these, or a larabar, or freeze dried fruit in my handbag for when I am out running errands or know my schedule may mess with regular mealtimes. Just having the protein from this small snack can be enough to carry me past the not so great food options and paired with a bottle of water or a juice gives me a much healthier path to follow when real good choices aren't fitting in to my needs (I need to sing in an hour - so something heavy ain't a good idea... It's time to take medications and an empty stomach makes that worse.)
customer_reviews.author: AZN CUST NC

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the Salted Caramel flavor, as I'm not a huge fan of dark chocolate, even knowing it's healthier for me. I hadn't had these before. They do make a healthy & filling snack. Very crunchy. But these are great to h as ve on hand! They're great to curb a sweet tooth, or when you're just plain hungry, in between meals.
customer_reviews.author: sassytexasgirl

customer_reviews.title: Stale and melted
customer_reviews.text: Definitely were not fresh. Still ok tasting but stale overly hard and the chocolate bottom was melted all over the wrapper prior to arriving. I do love this flavor and get them all the time however the staleness detracted way too much Would pay more and get from my local stores next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always have handy as a snack
customer_reviews.text: I have been eating these bars for a few years. I haven't found any I like as much other than ones I make. I keep some in my car in an insulated bag which is fine as long as it doesn't get too hot. If I eat them a few days in a row, I will develop canker sores so I try to keep them to a minimum. I always keep a few boxes on hand. I would recommend! Good flavor and good quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Lazarus

customer_reviews.title: My favorite healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: This bar is perfect for a little pick me up without consuming too many calories. It is truly delicious and satisfying. I much prefer this protein bar to the others that are tasteless and gooey junk. It is made from real natural products and leaves a pleasant after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: A healthy candy bar
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a good snack that was good for me an I found it. I found that the bars themselves are quite hard but if you can deal with that you have it licked! They have good flavor and stand true to their description chocolate-salt and nutty they go together good. I will be buying more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: James D. Schrock

customer_reviews.title: its my favorite flavor, and snack!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bar, although I would like to get the mini version. I find that I can only eat half of the bar. What I didn't like is the last bar I ate, I bit into a shell from a nut and broke half of my tooth, which wounded up costing me $15,00.00 for a porcelain crown. Not too happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Nutritious for a packaged food
customer_reviews.text: I love this flavor and so do my kids. I also love that it's much lower in sugar (5g per bar) than other KIND bars and has 6 grams of protein. I appreciate that I recognize almost all the ingredients as actual whole foods. I wish I could say that it was all the ingredients (it contains soy lecithin and glucose syrup) but It's certainly a lot healthier than the regular bars you find in the grocery store. The Amazon price is very good, especially if you do Subscribe and Save. The full price at my local Stop and Shop is $19.29 vs $15.47 on Amazon or $14.20 for Subscribe and Save. That's approximately a 30% savings!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: So yummy. Reasonable price compared to buying individually at the grocery.
customer_reviews.text: Yum yum. I bought these to include in a care package to my daughter, and unfortunately (for her), the box didn't fit so I had to open it and scatter the bars throughout the package, and as a result of my tasting one to make sure it was okay, the care package ultimately only had 8 of these bars instead of the 12 that are included. Or maybe 6, I don't remember. Quite an indulgence, and reasonably healthy as indulgences go.
customer_reviews.author: EL Bloom

customer_reviews.title: So Good, I ate two!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned about my expectations of taste. I knew the ingredients were good but I didn't know if they tasted good. Well, put that to rest. They are delicious. And as the package says, the number one ingredient is almonds. Delicious! I ate two within the first 30 minutes after UPS made the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: The Whistler

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: The bars are tasty and I like that they don't have a bunch of additives and unnecessary ingredients. They are great for traveling or camping and really help hold me over until I can eat. I love that they are Gluten Free. They have been a life saver when I couldn't get to anything that was gluten free for a bit while I traveled in Poland.
customer_reviews.author: Mel J Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Better than a candy bar and better for you!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Never had tried Kind bar before until Amazon sent me a free sample in the mail. I know what you are thinking, free sample = biased review. But hey, these were great. All nuts, good chocolate flavor, very little added sugar and touch of salt. I ate the bar they sent me. Bought a box on my own with a generous 15% discount. Now I am going to add it to my Subscribe & Save. These are that good.
customer_reviews.author: blip

customer_reviews.title: Great price for my favorite nut bar
customer_reviews.text: Anytime I can get Kind bars for anything close to $1.00/bar I load up since they can run anywhere from $2.49 to $1.99 not on sale. Satisfies my afternoon craving for a mild caffeine boost while also providing a little protein to satisfy my hunger. I always keep one in my golf bag.
customer_reviews.author: Don Nimura

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite granola bars! With only 4-5g of sugar per bar they are the perfect snack for someone who doesn't want to consume a lot of sugar, but also doesn't want to eat artificial sweeteners. These are made with pure cane sugar and only a handful of other easily pronounceable ingredients. They come in a variety of different flavors, but my favorite is the dark chocolate and nut flavor. These bars have both crunchy and chewy elements which makes them great for "chewy bar" people and "crunchy bar" people. If you are looking for a new and delicious snack then you should give these a try!
customer_reviews.author: T.R. Swan

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and it’s a very great tasting bar!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these before and these bars are wonderful they taste great and they are so much better than just having a candy bar. The quality is very good and I very pleased to have a snack that has great ingredients. I’m very pleased with my purchase! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Anglia Shaddy

customer_reviews.title: Good snack for a low carb diet.
customer_reviews.text: I am on a low carb diet and these Kind bars with dark chocolate nuts and sea salt are the lowest carb count of any bars that I have found. And I love how they taste. At home, I put them in the freezer, crunchy and cold for a summer snack. The only downfall of these bars is that they start to melt in my hiking pack in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: mary hagen

customer_reviews.title: Substantial in content, texture and taste
customer_reviews.text: Using a purse while volunteering at the zoo is not practical. A fanny pack is perfect. All I need to carry are my car keys, a thin credit card holder with money clip, a tube of lipstick and 2 Kind bars and I am good to go. These are smaller than most nutrition bars but to me are more substantial in content, texture and taste. FYI Amazon’s price per bar is 12 cents more than Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Zoo Lady

customer_reviews.title: Stale.
customer_reviews.text: These arrived and were a bit stale. I tend to run too behind in the morning to make myself breakfast so I’ll grab one of these on my way out the door. It’s hard to explain how these are considered stale but it’s almost like they crack off when biting instead of breaking, like the difference between frozen chocolate and room temperature chocolate. Since they’re not expired and still taste the same I do still eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are a wonderful, low glycemic snack that tastes great and holds blood sugar steady. As a diabetic I have to be very cautious of what I eat. These are great for a meal replacement or when blood sugar levels drop. They are so yummy that almost everyone I know will munch away happily and I have to hide mine so they are there when I need them. Supports a great cause as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eames

customer_reviews.title: Good, but almost always stale and hard as a brick
customer_reviews.text: Had a subscription for this for about a year, I would say maybe one in five shipments weren't wretchedly stale. Like literally, I cancelled it because I realized it's only a matter of until I chip a tooth or something. It's good, but I had a strong feeling I was paying for something that couldn't be sold in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Varghese

customer_reviews.title: The shrinking snack bar...not the price!
customer_reviews.text: I still love these, but I’ve noticed a substantial difference in size (less), seems like almost half, and not a difference in my price (stayed the same). Seems everyone wants to take advantage these days.
customer_reviews.author: Coby

customer_reviews.title: Do You Feel Lucky?
customer_reviews.text: If you get lucky you will get a box of bars that have some chew and the bars taste great. Most of the time the bars are rock hard, not good. Have ordered six boxes over the last several months. Two were good, four were awful. I'm done taking chances.
customer_reviews.author: misc.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious gluten free bars but very hard to bite/chew
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! A great snack as a pick-me-up! The only issue is that it’s basically like chewing nuts; hard to the bite. I’m fine with it but just a disclaimer for others with jaw or teeth related issues.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K.

customer_reviews.title: Bars were hard and cracked!
customer_reviews.text: I have been eating these bars for a while now. I decided to order them online and save a few dollars. Well, I was very disappointed with this order. The bars were extremely hard and many were broken. Will not be purchasing them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Crane

customer_reviews.title: Normally great, but these were rock hard
customer_reviews.text: The last box I received was very hard! Had to bite from the side of my mouth because of the discomfort of trying to bite with my front teeth. Pretty sure this is not normal, as I remember liking these a lot in the past when buying from the store. Wish I'd checked the expiration date on the box before tossing it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not My Favorite Kind Bar
customer_reviews.text: These Kind Bars were okay. I typically love the mint and chocolate combination, but these had a barely noticeable mint flavor. But other people might find them deliciously decadent. It's obviously a matter of personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: When the package was delivered.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I'm in Texas and out min tep is 80. Not sure what time the package was left. I would have been nice for the door bell to have been rung. Now all my edible bars are all melted. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Stale and hard!
customer_reviews.text: For awhile these were fantastic, but the last few orders have seemed stale. Although the package expiration date is out in the future, the bars are dried out and snap in the wrapper. Also, I have to be especially careful when biting into the bar not to crack a tooth or filling. I will take one more shipment and if they have not improved I will have to find a new source.
customer_reviews.author: Renovator

customer_reviews.title: Great snack that doesn't leave you feeling guilty
customer_reviews.text: I love chocolate but don't want to eat candy. Also allergic to oats, so getting a good bar, with chocolate and also relatively healthy to eat is a struggle. Kind bars do all of that and more. Tastes good, a good snack or if you're suddenly craving sweet but don't want to fall into the candy trap.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Sci_fi lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack!
customer_reviews.text: These have just a tiny hint of salt in every other bite and are absolutely delightful. Love that salt/chocolate combo! One warning though: You must have very strong teeth to bite into them as they are incredibly hard. I have to put them in the microwave for 15 seconds to soften them enough to bite and then chew them. The whole almonds are delicious - actually, everything about them is yummy - except I find them hard to chew. The price on Amazon was better than the local stores and they were sent promptly. I have sent them as surprise gifts to friends and everyone loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Senlin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of large almonds and dark chocolate, yum!
customer_reviews.text: These are healthy bars that the entire family will eat. The blend of dark chocolate and nuts is balance well and the size of the bar is enough to push back lunch a bit or for a healthy snack before a hike.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much the best snack bars out there
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much the best snack bars out there. I have Amazon delivering a box every two weeks, and they are always a treat! Plus KIND gets extra kudos from me for taking the FDA to task about their moronic and outdated labeling restrictions. The FDA needs to be able to tell the distinction between good fats and bad, and they need to get more serious about letting people know of the hazards of eating too much sugar. These bars are good food full of healthy fats from nuts, and low in sugar. Yay KIND! Keep up the good work and keep making great products!
customer_reviews.author: P. Blum

customer_reviews.title: Love this combination!
customer_reviews.text: Nice combination of nuts and darker chocolate. I have low blood sugar and it is a really great snack for me. I also feel like it gives me good nutrition and a variety I don't normally eat during the day.
customer_reviews.author: ZuzuLily

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and good and chocolately
customer_reviews.text: dark chocolate? YUM. This is a good flavor, and at my household we really like it. Only thing is in the ingredient list they use Canola Oil, there is no such thing as a Canola. This is a high temperature process to bring oil out of rapeseed, and then they called it Canola, I think that is marketing. Is it good for you? I donno, I called the company on this and they listened but nothing was changed, but it is tasty.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Spot
customer_reviews.text: I've tried sooooo many "protein" and "meal replacement" bars. So many are chalky, leave an aftertaste, or have questionable ingredients. Not these. a perfect middle of the afternoon snack.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Good source of protein, pleasing taste, healthy ingredients, lasts me at least four hours at lunchtime with coffee during a very busy and stressful day. I eat one every working day, easy to carry, not messy.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Tree Bark
customer_reviews.text: These are about as flavorful as bark. Actually, tree bark probably has more flavor.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Just Like Peanut Brittle
customer_reviews.text: I am too old now to eat peanut brittle. Remember that? These were hard as a rock and my dentist does not approve.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: I had eaten these before and enjoyed them, but these I purchased were stale & hard as heck.
customer_reviews.author: ChalHeman

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars but sadly the subscribe & save option is delivering stale products three month in a row. They are very crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Libert

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Should have read the reviews before purchasing. These were so hard and stale despite having a 2021 use by date. Do NOT purchase..and I wonder why Amazon still carries these...
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: omnomnom!
customer_reviews.text: I used to eat Luna bars, but that's an awful lot of sugar. As more evidence mounted that sugar is eeeeevil and fat is not so bad, I decided I needed a different breakfast so I traded the heavy sugar/lower fat Luna bar for these Kind bars. In addition to being better for you, the Dark Chocolate & Sea Salt are also tastier and more filling. Wish I'd switched sooner. Luna bars taste like over-processed candy to me now. The Dark Chocolate & Sea Salt are my favorite, with Maple Glazed Pecan & Sea Salt a close second.
customer_reviews.author: MBHH

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to take a bite
customer_reviews.text: These were ROCK hard. I don't know if they're stale, or affected by being in hot mail truck, or they're made this way, but I'll never order these again.
customer_reviews.author: klib

customer_reviews.title: Yay!  Only 5g Sugar In The Dark Chocolate Nuts & Sea Salt Recipe - They're Perfect For Me
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've tried Kind bars (Dark Chocolate Nuts & Sea Salt) and I love them. I don't buy candy bars due to all the sugar / carbs ... but at only 5g sugar in the dark chocolate version of the Kind bar, and fiber to help counter the rest of the carbs (16 carbs / 7 fiber), I decided to give these a try. I'm so glad I did. I think they are delicious and they are, for the most part, a guilt-free snack option for me that completely satisfying any craving I have for sweets. Much better than eating an actual candy bar. I will definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Downey

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and satisfying
customer_reviews.text: Dark chocolate covered nuts. What could make it better? Every few bites there is the nice pop of a little salt to make it suddenly sweet and savory. Not too much, just enough. We really like them and make an excellent snack or addition to the lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: My Eyes Are Up Here!

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmmm yessss taste gooood!
customer_reviews.text: So yummy and healthy for you! My daughter who has nut allergies to Tree nuts can eat this with no bad reaction she absolutely loves it as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Made For MY Needs!
customer_reviews.text: I have run into many bars that are nothing but modified candy bars: overly sweet and thoroughly chocolate. As a type II diabetic I like to have a backup bar. This one fits the bill nicely. It gives me enough sweetness to get me over a sugar slump and It has an ample amount of tasty DARK chocolate without being a dominate flavor. They also are not ruined if they get hot and don't melt easily in my glove box.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Carter

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on these based on the reviews. Never would I have thought they could be this delicious. They taste like they would be 500 calories and they are 180! Try them; you won't regret it. And they are worth every penny - and more!
customer_reviews.author: kh

customer_reviews.title: A go-to low sugar energy snack
customer_reviews.text: They taste like a candy bar, but are a superior choice due to the low sugar, so they manage that craving and are good to have on-the-go. Beware: they will melt in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: B Black

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for High Blood Sugar!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pre-diabetic, but not yet diabetic, so I "can" have some sweets. However, eating a snickers bar would be quite stupid. These bars are great because I can have a little bit of chocolate, but these are mostly almonds. Not a "healthy" snack, but they aren't the "I feel guilty eating this snack" either. When I have a sweet tooth, or when I'm on an airplane, or whenever I might be feeling weak enough to just have a few M&Ms, I grab this instead. It satisfies without the guilt.
customer_reviews.author: Krykie

customer_reviews.title: Very healthy and their best flavor
customer_reviews.text: After trying at least 5 flavors of Kind snacks, this is my favorite. It is full of almonds, just the right amount of dark chocolate and the faintest hint of sea salt. Very healthy and satisfies the urge to snack
customer_reviews.author: Teeekay

customer_reviews.title: Better than anticipated and a great hunger fighter.
customer_reviews.text: Just enough salt to balance the sweet. Lots of nuts and chewing involved. Better than a granola bar. Good for a protein fix and to satisfy hunger. Better than I expected. Definitely worth a repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Power packed, perfect for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I’m so impressed with the Kind line that I have sent them to my family and friends. My busy nieces and nephews carry these for break time and lunch. They’re perfect for breakfast too.
customer_reviews.author: JoeJustJoe

customer_reviews.title: Good treat for FODMAP Diet
customer_reviews.text: I’m on a low FODMAP diet, so I’m looking for a treat that’s gluten free & low in sugar. They taste pretty good. They’re not very large, & expensive for what you get. But they’re OK for a satisfying treat.
customer_reviews.author: Adele Casden

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting and seems to be freshly made. Better than most protein bars for taste.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the taste and size of this bar (just right). Most other bars are not very tasty and some seem to be sold past their expiration date...at least they taste that way.
customer_reviews.author: mwhite

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for Hospital Workers
customer_reviews.text: The recipients of these superb bars so appreciated the goodies, as they were taking care of my 80 year old friend and helping him to heal from a back accident. Timely arrived, were fresh, and are most flavorful!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Keeling

product_meta.title: KIND Bars, Dark Chocolate Nuts & Sea Salt, Gluten Free, Low Sugar, 1.4 Ounce, 12 Count
product_meta.description: Size:12 BarsThese bars are where our journey started and it was simple: whole ingredients like nuts, mixed with fruits and spices bound together with honey.
feature_bullets: Contains 12 - 1.4oz Dark Chocolate Nuts & Sea Salt KIND Bars
Our best-selling bar is a simple blend of Brazilian sea salt sprinkled over whole nuts and drizzled with dark chocolate.
With 5g of sugar, it's a satisfying, nutty snack that only seems indulgent.
Gluten free, Non GMO, 0g Trans Fat, Kosher
Low glycemic index, low sodium, good source of fiber

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
